entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
